summary: Prey For Rock & Roll is the story of Jacki and her all-girl rock and roll band, Clam Dandy, who are trying to make it in the LA club scene of the late 1980s. After ten years of being ... See full summary »
cast: Gina Gershon|Drea de Matteo|Lori Petty|Shelly Cole|Marc Blucas|Ivan Martin|Eddie Driscoll|Ashley Eckstein|Shakara Ledard|Texas Terri|Sandra Seacat|Nancy M. Pimental|Greg Rikaart|Francois Harold|Joannah Portman|Hallie King|Benjamín Benítez|Exene Cervenka|John Doe|Alan Passman|Tina Turner
title: Prey for Rock & Roll
